website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Yokota 2 Waterproof is an all-around hiker that boasts a great level of comfort and support. This makes it a sought-after hiking shoe by people who suffer from foot problems like pain, bunion, and postural deformity. The shoe needs just a little amount of breaking in to get a nice fit. While it can be used for varying activities on and off the trail, the Merrell Yokota 2 WP is more suitable for hiking on well-maintained trails.
pros: Lots of hikers agree that the Merrell Yokota 2 Waterproof is hands-down one of the most comfortable hiking shoes in the market today
Like most other Merrell outdoor-centric shoes, this hiker is highly rated for having great foot support
Those who have bunion feet, high arches, and constant foot pain didn’t have any problem wearing it
A lot are happy to find that this hiking shoe fits nicely after a little breaking in
Like with other outdoor footwear from Merrell, buyers are highly satisfied with the price of these waterproof shoes
Merrell Yokota 2 Waterproof has gotten good reviews for being durable
One hiker praised its sturdy footbed and quality construction
cons: A few wearers say that the shoe squeaks or ‘crinkles’ with each step, especially when wet
Some customers note that the Merrell Yokota 2 WP isn’t for serious hikes
This shoe doesn’t perform well on rocky terrains, according to them

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: I got these as work shoes. I have to walk jobsites and sometimes the dew is still on the grass. I wanted a waterproof shoe because of this. The first time I walked thru the dewy grass my feet got wet. NOT HAPPY about this. Ive had other merrells that were waterproof and they were great. Not this pair.
customer_reviews.author: indyrubi

customer_reviews.title: Runs Very Small and weirdly crunchy
customer_reviews.text: Even though I took the advice of numerous other reviews and ordered a half size larger, these were still way too tight. I really liked the look of these but in the end, if they don't fit, well, they don't fit. Also, given that these were the "waterproof" version of the style, I found it kind of bizarre that they had a distinct crunching sound when you flexed these shoes. I'm sure it's the inner membrane, but just note that it is audibly noticeable. I really liked many Merrell shoes over the years, but this style is a hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: ResearchEverything

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakfast cereal 😚
customer_reviews.text: They're ok. I've been wearing them for about 2 weeks. I frame houses for a living and require a pretty heavy duty shoe. I expect a lot. I assume these shoes won't disappoint too badly. I like the sole better than my last pair of Merrell's.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Unusually tight for Merrell, be sure to get something wider.
customer_reviews.text: This yokota is sized smaller.. specifically narrower than other Merrell. You need to size up at least one half size maybe a whole size for equal width as normal Merrell shoes. I bought two pair, a men's 9 for my wife and a men's 13 for me. The 9 was a whole size too small for my wife, and I ended up returning that. She normally wears a Merrell men's 9. I have kepy my 13.. but it is tight, and I am hoping it stretches...
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: I have trouble fitting Merrell shoes
customer_reviews.text: These looked like a good style, were waterproof, and not too heavy while being utilitarian. The trouble is I have trouble fitting this model as well as Merrells. Either my toes hit the front of the box or my foot slides around, with nothing in-between. Frankly I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kane

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to finally order a pair of Merrells. They arrived quickly and seemed to be of great quality. Unfortunately they were about a half size too small. I wear a size 15, which is the largest size I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.. it's Merrell
customer_reviews.text: From the description it wasn't clear if the shoes used bungee laces which is what I was looking for, I did replace the laces with bungee cord and it worked just fine. Other than that, perfect shoes for hiking, they fit comfortably and are durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have a slightly wider foot so I get men shoes and these fit like a glove. Walked on the PNW beach on a stormy day, been through puddles, and hiking. Feet stayed dry, warm and comfy. They are nice looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieBunny

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: My last pair lasted me years and years. I loved them. When deciding on a new pair, I tried on lots a different styles. However I ended up coming back here and buying the Yokotas again. Several months later I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Christina & Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for diabetic with high arches
customer_reviews.text: My husband's podiatrist recommended this show 10 years ago and we have stayed with it. Works great for my husband who walks constantly on his job.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Getting something returned it did not work. I don’t buy things to return them!
customer_reviews.text: Merrell seems to be cutting the material on their shoes. This is the second pair I bought over the past two years that don’t fit. I’ve even gone up from 11 1/2 to 12 in there still two small. Shipping and everything else was great as always!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Stiff sole
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, it didn't seem like the shoe's fit was going to be all that good coming out of the box. I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable it actually fit upon initial wearing. If I had any issues its the soles. I realize they are supposed to be "off road" capable but they are a bit stiff.
customer_reviews.author: P. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fits my son
customer_reviews.text: My son outgrew the previous pair. New size works perfectly. He is happy with the lightness, comfort and waterproof for mowing, hiking and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but ran small
customer_reviews.text: I own Merrills & they're great but this model ran small.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Beckner

customer_reviews.title: They are sized too small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 men’s shoe. These were a full size too small. I’ve never had that happen with Merrill shoes. I returned them and decided to go to a shoe store to buy them so I could confirm the proper size.
customer_reviews.author: car

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for bad weather and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Great for all types of weather and I even wear them to the gym to workout. They stay perfectly dry in the snow or stepping in puddles. This is my first pair of Merrells and I'll be buying another pair when and if these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. Good support. Good quality. Very attractive. Bought another pair in case they quit making this style.
customer_reviews.author: tkmars

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size.
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear 9.5 M in Merrell shoes but these needed to be wide. Had to send them back to Peltz Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: Good long lasting material
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these, third pair his had me order for him, he does building construction and just loves them for work
customer_reviews.author: urshurt

customer_reviews.title: great shoe but....
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but the width is too narrow. I figure I could break them in after a few months.But they still failed to stretch. they need ake some shoes with a little more width offered.
customer_reviews.author: bill thacker

customer_reviews.title: best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect right out of the box. Love the water prof aspect, although they were only water prof for about a year, but I do put some miles on them. Not my first pair and wont be my last.
customer_reviews.author: shad m.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Merrell
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a merrell. It’s all said. Perfect wherever you use it.
customer_reviews.author: RDV

customer_reviews.title: Not a true U.S. Men's size 15
customer_reviews.text: This product fit is not as advertised or indicated. I have wore several other Merrell shoe styles. These are too small for me and I wish I could return them. They do not fit and are more representative of a size 14.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money .
customer_reviews.text: Tried these shoes on in the store then found them on sale for 30 dollars cheaper on amazon when I tried them on they didn’t fit and sounded like I was walking on bubble wrap. If this is what they are going to with there product they can count me out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ive been a Merrell buyer about 8yrs now. This is the 1st time that i am unhappy with my purchase. Shoes fit to snug, had to take insoles out to make room and still uncomfortable. Not a Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo barrasso

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, run small
customer_reviews.text: This product must run small I’ve bought several pairs of these shoes and return them was too tight of a fit every time
customer_reviews.author: Phil Davey

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. Bought first for hiking in Alaska. Enjoyed so much just continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back on the trail!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and fit great. Waterproof tested in a Grecian rainstorm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misshapen heel
customer_reviews.text: Something in right heel rubs on bottom of my ankle. like it is misshapen. Like the color and fit. Hopefully they will break in.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna V

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered as a gift , so no accessment yet !
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I wear a men's 9 and purchased a similar pair of Merrell hiking shoes 4 or so months ago. They were tight but I thought they would loosen up while they were breaking in. They haven't, and because I've been wearing them and they're outside the return window, I bought this pair of Yokota 2 hiking shoes in a 9 1/2. These were even tighter than the first pair. I think they'd be great shoes but the unusually poor sizing is a big problem for me. Had to return them and I'll have to look for another brand. (Need to try them on at a local store first.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Try a pair first.
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 13 but this definitely runs smaller and I’m not sure if a 14 would be too big. I liked the style and waterproof feature but it does crinkle a bit (must be the waterproofing in shoe. Overall I kept them and gave them to brother who’s a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe makes a weird sound when walking. I bought them in the summer and didn’t start wearing them until fall, big mistake, I can’t return them now.
customer_reviews.author: Ugene

customer_reviews.title: This pair was mismarked size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 9.5-just like my previous pair- and although they were labeled 9.5 they felt like size 8.5! I could hardly get them on. Clearly they were mis labeled by the manufacturer. I returned them an ordered size 10 and they fit fine. Weird
customer_reviews.author: Papa Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Merrell makes great shoes. Nothing more I can say. Quality is great and I put them to the test hard and will last over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these locally, and returned them after realizing they "crinkle" with each step. Otherwise, they were comfortable, at 1/2 size larger than usual for me. The noise might only be noticeable in a quiet room, but excited my dogs, and woke them from sleep. I assume it's the waterproof membrane making the noise, but I've had other waterproof shoes that are silent.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect much
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and was comfortable but 2 weeks in and they are falling apart. The stitching around 80% of the mesh areas has came loose. E-mailed the company two times with no response. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: loribelle1
